item.title: I need coder for autosave
item.dc:creator: @Angel_of_grim Angel of grim
item.description:
@Angel_of_grim wrote:

hang on i’ll check[br][size=1]Posted at: November 26, 2006, 10:07:24 PM[/size][hr]okay this might help

[quote=“Version”]Purpose:Auto Saving

Difficulty: 1

Assumed Knowledge: Copy and Paste

Server Base: TestScape or Cheezscape

Classes Modified: and

Procedure
Step 1:
Declare these Vars

public static boolean AutoSave = false; public int savecounter = 0;
Step 2:

add this under Public boolean process()

savecounter++; if(savecounter >= 60 && AutoSave == false) { AutoSave = true; savefile = true; savecounter = 0; }
Step 3:
Open playerHandler.java
add this

if(client.AutoSave == true) { if(saveGame(players[i])) { System.out.println("Game saved for player "+players[i].playerName); } else { System.out.println("Could not save for "+players[i].playerName); }; client.AutoSave = false; }

under of

if(players[i].playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(kickNick)) { players[i].kick(); kickNick=""; }

Credits: Krazy_MeerKat[/quote]

Read full topic

AutoSave = true;
savecounter = 0;

public boolean process() { // is being called regularily every 500ms
if((IsAttackingNPC || IsAttacking) && FullGuthanEquipped()) {
int chance = 0;
chance = misc.random(10);

		if(chance == 3) {
			playerLevel[3] += (hitDiff);

	}

	}

		actionTimer -= 1;
	}
	if (actionAmount > 4) {
		sendMessage("Kicked for acting too fast!");
		misc.println("Client acts too fast - disconnecting it");
		disconnected = true;

item.title: I need coder for autosave
item.dc:creator: @Angel_of_grim Angel of grim
item.description:
@Angel_of_grim wrote:

[quote="#1killa"]Purpose: Autosaving ever 30sec

Difficulty: 3

Assumed Knowledge: add things

Server Base: client and playerhandler

Classes Modified:

public static boolean AutoSave = false; public int savecounter = 0;

Then search for public boolean process(), add this in it somewhere:

savecounter++; if(savecounter >= 60 && AutoSave == false) { AutoSave = true; savecounter = 0; }

Now save that and open up PlayerHandler.java (in your server folder) and search for playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(kickNick)) and add this above it
For WhiteScape:

if(client.AutoSave == true) { if(saveGame(players[i])) { System.out.println("Game saved for player "+players[i].playerName); } else { System.out.println("Could not save for "+players[i].playerName); }; client.AutoSave = false; }

BY Krazy_Meerkat

For CheezScape:

if(client.AutoSave == true) { if(saveGame(players[i])) { savechar(players[i]); System.out.println("Game saved for player "+players[i].playerName); } else { System.out.println("Could not save for "+players[i].playerName); }; client.AutoSave = false; }[/quote]

Read full topic
